channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: From the start on henwick Road to the school pathway has dog fouling all the way along, 21st November
item.description:
Dog fouling is a joke on this road there needs to be a camera on the corner to catch the person doing it. All school charente are treading it in its all over so its hard to dodge when you have small children and prams.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wendover Road, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cr Great Russell St and Bury Place, 21st November
item.description:
Bollard has been damaged - probably by a car or truck turning. The bollard is lying in Bury Place near the London Review of books.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Great Russell Street, Bloomsbury, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep potholes outside Dominos, 21st November
item.description:
Unsure how long the potholes have been there but they are fairly deep and vehicles will be damaged if they drive over them.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Road, West Green, Tottenham, London Borough of Haringey

item.title: Disused Boiler Dumped on Pavement, 21st November
item.description:
A disused and unwanted domestic boiler has been left dumped on the pavement outside number 31. Can the local team please remove it. Thank you.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Waverley Road, Plumstead

item.title: Consistent bad bin placement, 21st November
item.description:
Some bins are un- numbered. Others are from 20 vernham road - not even vambery road house. They have been warned by council before. All bins are obstructing the pavement. Vernham road bins shouldn't be there

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Admaston Road, Plumstead

item.title: Temporary traffic lights not working, 21st November
item.description:
3 way control lights on charlton road at the junction with marlborough road and victoria way are not working.almost caught in an accident as the lights on victoria way went green and as i turned into charlton road all the traffic was coming towards me forcing me to mount the pavement to avoid cars and buses.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Charlton Road, Charlton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bollards unlit, 21st November
item.description:

item.title: Dumped tins of paint, 21st November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Okehampton Crescent, East Wickham, Greater London
